addr: 845 United Nations Plaza (1st Avenue) & 48th Street,  New York, NY 10017
title: Singles Mix & Match Happy Hour
desc: This event is being sponsored by over a dozen different Singles groups.? The number of RSVP's listed on this Meet Up reflect only a portion of those actually attending. This event is a combination of a Match Live event and Speed Dating.? Join over 100 fun and friendly singles for a casual and comfortable singles party that you won't want to miss. Here is how it works.. -Upon arrive you will be given a name tag with your code name and number.. -You will also be given a sheet where you can keep track of everyone you meet. -We will have several ice breaker games throughout the night where you will have a chance to meet others at the event and write down the code names and numbers of those you wish to make a connection with. -At the end of the night write down the names and the numbers of the people that you met and would like to see again.? You will then hand in your sheet and we will send you the contact info for all the people who have a mutual match with you! You will be able to choose up to 10 people for potential matches. The Night Will Feature: -Drink specials -Ice Breaker games with prizes -Full menu is available -Music played at conversational levels Can I come alone? Yes 98% of those attending will be coming on their own.? You may also bring a non single wing person who will be identified by pairs of wings. ? What are the age ranges? This event will cater mostly to 20's-40's.? There will be age specific matching games but you will also have a chance to match outside of your age range.
